original_title: The Chronicles of Riddick: Dark Fury
overview: After their narrow escape at the end of "Pitch Black,"  Riddick, Jack and the Imam find themselves at the mercy of a madwoman who intends to entomb Riddick forever as part of a twisted art exhibit.  With little but a shiv and Riddick's innate viciousness to aid them, Riddick and his allies must find a way to escape from their captor and her band of mercenaries.
title: The Chronicles of Riddick: Dark Fury
